Classes in org.jmc used by org.jmc
Chunk
          Class describing a chunk.
ChunkLoaderThread
          Chunk loader interface.
Colors
          Color class
MainPanel
          Main Panel containing all the content of the window.
MainWindow
          MainWindow class.
MemoryMonitor
          Memory monitor panel and thread.
MTLFile
          Material file class.
MTLFile.Side
          A small enum for describing the sides of a cube.
OBJFile
          OBJ file class.
OBJFile.Face
          Small internal class for describing a simple rectangular face of an object.
OBJFile.MeshType
          Small enum describing the mesh types.
OBJFile.TexCoordinate
          Small enum describing the UV location of the texture for simple rectangular textures.
OBJFile.Vertex
          Small internal class for describing Vertices in a sortable fashion.
PreviewPanel
          Panel used for displaying the preview of the map.
PreviewPanel.ChunkImage
          Small internal class describing an image of a single chunk this preview is comprised of.
PreviewPanel.MapMarker
          Small internal class for map markers.
Region
          Region file class.
